Paper.Title: Morph~lo~leal Decomposition and 5tress Assignment for Speech Synthesis

Section.Paragraph: A speech synthesizer is a machine that inputs a stream of text and outputs a speech signal. This paper will discuss a small piece of how words are converted to phonemes.

Typically words are converted to phonemes in one of two ways: either by looking the words up in a dictionary (with possibly some limited morphological analysis), or by sounding the words out from their spelling using basic principles.
